record.description: Tri-Cities students speak. Russ Parsons (left) goes over his talk on athletics with Bud Linden. They were among six University of Chicago students who discussed various phases of student life, Saturday, October 21, before seventy-five key members from all parts of the country of the newly launched University of Chicago Alumni Foundation. The meeting was held in the James Henry Breasted Hall of the Oriental Institute. Linden talked about dramatics.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
